greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Composite numbers with property that n minus sum of prime factors of n is prime.
comment: Prime factors are totaled with multiplicity, e.g., 8 = 2*2*2 so the sum of the prime factors of 8 = 6. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 14 2011
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Aug 15 1999
